muycn3GfBTDn4u7Ir.name: Tough Skin
muycn3GfBTDn4u7Ir.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

mFxz8lU9W0TAT2sHV.name: Partial (@Location, 1 level per -1 Per Hit Modifier, Torso is -10% thus level 1@)

mS8izSldJK6EdzsWU.name: Frequency: Constantly
mS8izSldJK6EdzsWU.notes: Lose 1 HP per minute without it

mL-eZMTWHgpf0Y9Pg.name: Frequency: Hourly
mL-eZMTWHgpf0Y9Pg.notes: Lose 1 HP per 10 minutes after missing a hourly dose

mmYvrOKmlXZbbDv_J.name: Frequency: Daily
mmYvrOKmlXZbbDv_J.notes: Lose 1 HP per hour after missing a daily dose

mSBcIeNvPaJhqyqDB.name: Frequency: Weekly
mSBcIeNvPaJhqyqDB.notes: Lose 1 HP per six hours after missing a weekly dose

m2nrEaNFeFBlgFfEl.name: Frequency: Monthly
m2nrEaNFeFBlgFfEl.notes: Lose 1 HP per day after missing a monthly dose

m_0oi26_iweUVKwrO.name: Frequency: Seasonally
m_0oi26_iweUVKwrO.notes: Lose 1 HP per 3 days after missing a seasonal dose

mhBihbpvUDBjj1DWF.name: Frequency: Yearly
mhBihbpvUDBjj1DWF.notes: Lose 1 HP per 2 weeks after missing a yearly dose

mTHlUb-CXRG6NUYjO.name: Aging
mTHlUb-CXRG6NUYjO.notes: Age 2 years for each HP lost due to this dependency

t5pEqTwG20zDeMs8i.name: Selfless
t5pEqTwG20zDeMs8i.notes: You must make a self-control roll to put your needs – even survival – before those of someone else.
